#define CFS_CAP_FS_MASK
Value:
((1 << CFS_CAP_CHOWN) |                 \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE) |          \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_DAC_READ_SEARCH) |       \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_FOWNER) |                \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_FSETID ) |               \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_LINUX_IMMUTABLE) |       \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_ADMIN) |             \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_BOOT) |              \
                         (1 << CFS_CAP_SYS_RESOURCE))
